channel.title: Deborah Kinnear on Transcripts of Iriss.fm
channel.description: Recent content in Deborah Kinnear on Transcripts of Iriss.fm

item.title: This is Me: valuing the lives of people with learning disabilities
item.description: Michael: On this podcast, I was speaking to Dr Deborah Kinnear from the Scottish Learning Disability Observatory. I was asking her about the new campaign; This is Me 22. But first of all, I wanted to find out more about what is the Scottish Learning Disability Observatory. Deborah, before we begin speaking about This is Me 22, can you tell us a wee bit about what is the Scottish Learning Disability Observatory?
